favourite.article: Awesome!!!! Thank You Lord, bless the soul of the originator of this song. It is uplifting.
This song makes me alive every morning. What a wonderful song. I thank the Lord for everything and for giving me another day to exercise my spirit with the saints... Amen!!!
I like this song. it's challenging. I'll learn it and teach the young people so that we can all enjoy it together. It's so wonderful to realize that Christ is in all the saints. Amen!!
